title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar when using Build 200201151. Perform a search for references to the field 'tmpFir'.
OB: When performing the search for references to the field 'tmpFir', the search results should be selected.
EB: After performing the search for references to the field 'tmpFir' in method getTempDir(), the search results are not being selected.
SR: To resolve this issue, make sure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE and ensure that you have the source for rt.jar. Then, open java.io.File and select the field 'tmpFir' to perform the search.
